text: Live in Antwerp is a live album by German rock band Kadavar, released on 6 June 2014 by Nuclear Blast. It was their first live album and fourth album overall. The record featured live versions of 11 tracks that originally appeared on studio albums Kadavar and Abra Kadavar, performed and recorded at various live shows in Antwerp, Belgium. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ;Kadavar *Christoph Lindemann – vocals, electric guitar *Simon Bouteloup - bass *Christoph Bartelt - drums, percussion ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2014 live albums Category:Kadavar albums
title: Live in Antwerp
